recipes.title: Sugar Cookies With White Chocolate, Almonds, and Cranberries
recipes.description: Unsalted, in the blue bag

recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.description: A thin crust pizza dough recipe that's quick, easy, and delicious with Peperonni, onions, salsa

recipes.title: Polish Egg Bread
recipes.description: This recipe came from a friend and it is fantastic. I was in Poland in August and enjoyed the bread there so I was glad when I received this recipe. Everyone asks me for the recipe.

recipes.title: French Spring Soup
recipes.description: It is very fresh tasting, and the longer it sits, the better it is.

recipes.title: Easter Deviled Eggs
recipes.description: A very easy, special touch for Easter and fun to do at baby showers as well. Do some plain white ones to keep everyone happy.

recipes.title: World's Best Lasagna
recipes.description: It takes a little work, but it is worth it.

recipes.title: Leftover Pulled Pork
recipes.description: Got leftover pulled pork that you don't want to go to waste? You're in luck! Put your leftovers to good use with these genius recipes

recipes.title: Spicy Salmon Dinner
recipes.description: Looking for inspiration on how to spice up salmon dinners? From a sweet-spicy marinade for whole grilled salmon to fiery wasabi mayo salmon fillets, and spicy smoked salmon sushi recipes.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy and sweet, pancakes are the ultimate breakfast treat.

recipes.title: Fragola Pazzo
recipes.description: This is an Italian dessert that goes great with pasta. As the name suggests, it's a crazy combination but surprisingly excellent.

recipes.title: Light and Delicious Pasta
recipes.description: Stick-to-your-ribs pasta recipes seem like fall and winter meals, right? Sure, pasta salad knows no season.

recipes.title: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
recipes.description: Make a top.rated salad with fresh spinach ans fresh strawberries

recipes.title: Lemon Icebox Pie
recipes.description: A favorite dessert when a no-bake, fast pie is needed

recipes.title: Spinach Quiche
recipes.description: Let me start by saying that I devised the recipe myself, and I just sort of add this and that. The recipe is very forgiving

recipes.title: Honey Glazed Ham
recipes.description: This ham tastes very much like the famous honey baked ham but costs much less, and there's no need to fight the crowds at holiday time
